researcherInfoSys

Class Researcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • researcherInfoSys.Researcher

  • public class Researcher
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores data for a researcher, and contains a repository of all researcher as well, by which a series of functionalities can be realized. Main functionalities includes:
    • get number of distinct researchers
    • get number of distinct interests
    • get number of researchers with a specified interest
    • get detailed information of a specified researcher
    • get number of times two interests con-occur
    Instances of this class store:
    • the name of a researcher, as a String
    • the university of a researcher, as a String
    • the department of the university, as a String
    • the list of interest of a researcher
    Researchers with the same name, department and university attributes are generally considered as the same people, with their interests combined. Otherwise, they're considered as different people.
    Author:
    james

      • getResearcherInfo

      • add

        public static Researcher add(Researcher newResearcher)
        Add a researcher instance to the repository and offer it a valid id after checking duplication. Check whether the researcher has appeared in previous records. If so, combine two records and update the later record researcher id.
        Parameters:
        newResearcher - the instance of a new researcher
        Returns:
        the instance of this new researcher with his valid researcher id

      • addToInterests

        public void addToInterests(java.lang.String interestsStr)
        Parese a String of interests list and add them to interests Repository.
        Parameters:
        interestsStr - the interests String to be parsed

      • areSame

        private static boolean areSame(Researcher ra,
                               Researcher rb)
        Check whether two researcher records with same name represent the same person by comparing their university and department information.
        Parameters:
        ra - one instance of researcher
        rb - another instance of researcher
        Returns:
        true if two record represent the same researcher

      • getWarningInfo

        public static java.lang.String getWarningInfo()
        Get a summary of the researcher repository, whose data come from the Excel file. Announce the number of records with same name, and the strategy to handle them, that is, considering records with same department and university name as the same researcher, otherwise as different researchers.
        Returns:
        the summary of the researcher repository read from Excel file

      • createMalletData

        public static void createMalletData()
        Write the information containing in the repository to a text file, in the format required by the mallet API for further processing.
